title: [VOC] Demo verbiage
body:
## Verbiage for a demo

# Steps to complete

- [ ] Include the following verbiage 
How Can Vacation Offer Corporate Help You? Request a Demo and See for Yourself
Have you or your corporation been paying more money for hotel accommodations than necessary simply because you're using the wrong provider? Most corporations make use of consumer-oriented sites such as Expedia or Travelocity. As a result, they pay consumer rates -- when they could be paying corporate rates by using Vacation Offer Corporate (VOC) instead.
Our easy-to-use online platform provides corporate/B2B rates on hotel rooms, rental cars, and transfers for organizations just like yours. No more paying way too much and then sending those invoices to the corporation for reimbursement.
Want to reduce paperwork, time and effort even as you're slashing the rates your company is currently paying for travel expenses? Credit-worthy corporations can apply for the VOC credit program. Your employees can book their travel arrangements without using a credit card or flooding your offices with reimbursement requests.

The Vacation Offer Corporate Difference
the right tools make all the difference in any kind of work, profession or industry -- and the right travel tools can make all the difference in how efficiently your corporation accomplishes its travel agendas. When you switch from a B2C platform to our dedicated B2B travel arrangement platform, you can:

View past and future bookings with ease
Organize all your travel arrangements through one platform
Choose from a variety of hotel options, just as you would with the consumer-based platforms
Enroll in our credit program to streamline your company travel expenses while reducing the headaches associated with employee reimbursements
All of these differences add up to one big difference in your corporate bottom line --and we can prove it to you.

Request a Demo Today

Just how easy is it to use the Vacation Offer Corporate platform, and just how much money can your corporation save in the process? There's no more convincing way to find out than by running the numbers for yourself. Request a demo and you'll get a real-time comparison of hotel rates using our B2B platform as opposed to a standard B2C platform. Discover the tremendous potential advantages of making VOC your preferred corporate travel engine. We're ready to help your organization go places!

title: [VOC] Email Marketing Blast
body:
## Description
Create an email template for a marketing blast 


# Steps to complete

- [ ] Include the following verbiage 

Subject: Save on corporate travel

Are you tired of paying consumer rates for business travel?

If you’re still using travel search engines to book your corporate trips or trips for your employees on a corporate credit card, then waiting for reimbursements, there is a better way.

Allen Marketing Group is proud to introduce Vacation Offer Corporate, a travel search engine that provides B2B rates for your business travel. You have the ability to book hotel rooms, rental cars, and transfers at a corporate rate for you or your employees’ work travel.

As with other travel search engines, it’s easy to use. One platform keeps everything streamlined, and there are many options for airlines and hotels. One employee is able to do all of your bookings as well, ensuring that all of your travelers are on the same page.

The best part is no more waiting for reimbursements. For frequent travelers, there’s a credit program that allows employees to book travel without the need to charge a company credit card. This not only streamlines your company travel expenses, but it also ensures employee reimbursements are more efficient.

Stop paying consumer rates for your corporate travel. Visit Vacation Offer Corporate to get started!

- [ ] Include social links, and unsubscribe button

title: [AMG] Email Template Fixes: Outlook
body:
## Description

	
Outlook filtered the email from your domain to the Spam folder. Troubleshooting tips:

Sign up for [Microsoft's Smart Network Data Services](https://sendersupport.olc.protection.outlook.com/snds/addnetwork.aspx) to get the information about the traffic originating from your IP address. The SNDS gives you the data you need to understand and improve your reputation at Microsoft. Data includes filtering, complaint rate, and spam trap hits. If you see a high number of complaints and spam trap hits, re-check your email list acquisition sources and make sure you are sending relevant content to subscribed recipients.

Track your complaints, bounce, blocked and dropped messages as they influence the Outlook's inbox placement. GlockApps Bounce Monitor can help you track all of these metrics.

Outlook.com filters email using Symantec/Brightmail Probe Network and cloud-based email filtering service Exchange Online Protection (EOP). IPs not previously used to send email typically don't have any reputation built up in Microsoft systems. As a result, emails from new IPs are more likely to experience deliverability issues. Search for your current IP Reputation data here and request removal if you are listed.

Change the "From" email address. Using a different email address (even one on the same domain) can sometimes help deliver the email to the Outlook's Inbox.

Separate your outlook.com email subscribers and send the email to that segment via a different SMTP server or email service provider.

You can get the domain in Microsoft's whitelist from here

title: [AMG] Email Template Fixes: Sendgrid url
body:
## Description

Your email contains a URL from sendgrid.net listed in the URIBL greylist. This list contains domains found in Unsolicited Bulk Emails. It may include ESPs which allow customers to import their recipient lists and may have no control over the subscription methods. 

Email service providers use a generic (default) tracking domain to track all the emails sent through its servers by its users. You can ask your email service provider whether or not you can white-label tracking links including unsubscribe and open tracking links. If not, you can use G-Lock Analytics that allows you to use a custom tracking domain and brand tracking links with your own domain. 

Some advantages of using a custom tracking domain instead of the default one provided by the service provider are: 

White-labelling of tracking links can help you land in the inbox.
A custom tracking domain will help create your own brand image with no ESP footprints.
Your own custom tracking domain will allow you build your own sending reputation.
Tracking links will be branded with your domain name which will make your subscribers much more confident in opening your emails and clicking links as they will be related to your brand.

title: [AMG] Email template fixes from glockapps
body:
## Description

Fix issues found by glockapps in the amg/vo email templates

Location:
- controllers: `app/mailers`
- views `app/views/[name of mailer]`: so lead_mailer, payment_mailer, etc

Branch to use for fixes
- `hotfix/1411-email-fixes`

# Steps to complete

- [ ] Sendgrid url - #1412
- [x] TinyPNG the images - #1413
- [x] Shortened urls - #1414
- [x] Html the `<head>` tag must contain a title - #1415
- [x] Alt tags for images - #1416
- [ ] Find and correct spam phrases if we can
- [ ] Figure out how to get in the Outlook inbox - #1417

Other issues:
	
- [ ] Your message contains too many images (17). A best practice is to have a 65/35 text to image ratio to avoid deliverability issues.
- [ ] Your message contains too many links (20). Reduce the number of links in your message content. It's also a best practice to limit the number of different domains linked in an email.

title: [VOF] Payment Processing for one off manual payments - V2
body:
Extending the workflow for one off manual payments in https://github.com/UnicornAgency/AMG-CRM/issues/1406

**Describe the solution you'd like**
- [ ]  Using the admin dashboard, an admin enters in basic information of the user who needs to make a payment. "first name", "last name", "email address", "amount to be paid"
- [ ]  The system creates a unique URL based on the information provided and an email is dispatched.
- [ ] When the user accesses the URL, all the relevant fields are prefilled.
- [ ] Same workflow as https://github.com/UnicornAgency/AMG-CRM/issues/1406 for processing the payment
- [ ] Once a payment is successful the URL is disabled and cannot be accessed again

Note Once again, No Zoho workflows should kick in

**Additional context**
Version 2 for https://github.com/UnicornAgency/AMG-CRM/issues/1406

title: [VOF] Payment Processing for one off manual payments - V1
body:
On occasion, VOF packages are purchased and arranged without the conventional workflow.(Verbally or perhaps personal use). To ease the process of payments, we want a hidden page where users can visit and use the app to make the payments

**Describe the solution you'd like**

- [ ] Have an obfuscated + hidden URL
- [ ] The page should contain a "first name", "last name", "email address" and payment fields along with an "amount" field
- [ ] Payment will be processed via Terminal CC3.
- [ ] User gets a success notification upon payment success
- [ ] A simple email is sent to the user containing the payment receipt
- [ ] A simple email is sent to Terry providing the information of who performed a payment and the amount

**Note** No Zoho Workflows should kick in for these cases

## Narrative

## Scenario
When an agent is showing a potential user the VOC site the should be able to use a demo account that allows them to give a presentation.

title: [VSF] Stamps Task creation: automation
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
Currently the activity of creating tasks for processing stamps, in zoho, is a manual process for CSR. 

1. In Zoho, when a lead status is set to qualified zoho creates an automated task
2. The CSR then looks at the gifts field and deciphers which gifts are eligible for being processed as Stamps
3. The CSR updates the subject of the task with the acronyms of the all the gifts that need to be mailed out seperated by a "+" and ending with "via USPS Priority Mail®"

**Describe the solution you'd like**
1. Once the lead is set to qualified zoho should dispatch a webhook to the AMG app(containing the lead)
2. The AMG app then creates a task for that lead
   1.  It parses the gifts_new field and identifies which tasks are stamp tasks based off a gift / acronym / eligibility mapping that will be provided.
   2.  The subject is "Send " followed by all the eligible acronyms seperated by a " + " and ending with a "via USPS Priority Mail®".
   3. The print message is all the eligible acronyms concatenated.
   4. Priority is "High"
   5. Priorty Mail is "Yes"
   6. Status is "Not Started"
   7. Currency is "USD" (even for Candian mail @unicorn-amg ?)
   8. Due Date is ______ (@unicorn-amg ?)

title: [VOF] Convert homepage hero react to use new Hooks API
body:
## Description

On the vof homepage, there is a section called the HomepageHero (top of the page). We want to improve the code (there are some leftover legacy code and some code that was never fixed) and convert it to use the Hooks API (useState, useEffect, etc). 

for references see any voc component or vof packages components

- components location: `javascript/components/vof/hero`
    - HomepageHero.js covert to HomepageHero.jsx (main component)

# Steps to complete

- [ ] branch from `feature/vof-rh-refactor`
- [ ]  remove all dependencies on jQuery (as much as you can)
- [ ]  convert state to useState, useEffect
- [ ]  create a HeroContext or other contexts as needed
- [ ]  fix broken code like the method `setDestinationListBarPos`

title: [VOF] Rebuild categories carousel
body:
## Description

Build the homepage categories carousel from scratch (or tweak another carousel) as I cannot fix or find a carousel that does what we want that doesn't take up too much resources .

title: [VSF] Refund Tab: Refunding Upgrades Bug
body:
When attempting to process a refund for an upgrade (transaction ID is in `$Upgrades.Upgrade Auth Code` the system responds with the message: "The reference transaction does not meet the criteria for issuing a credit"

It appears the system is not checking cc3 for the upgrade auth code and processing the transaction from there. Please review the attached screenshot and note that authorize.net allows the refund to process. 
![screen shot 2019-02-12 at 8 06 51 am](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25444105/52645170-78075380-2e9d-11e9-9172-efd73e051b22.jpg)

title: [VSF] Refund Tab: Process refunds that do not meet criteria
body:
Sometimes we need to process a refund to a credit card outside of the time that authorize.net "allows." If authorize.net gives us the "The referenced transaction does not meet the criteria for issuing a credit" error, the system should process a refund manually using the credit card information on the corresponding lead ID in Zoho.

![screen shot 2019-02-12 at 8 04 24 am](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25444105/52644826-d122b780-2e9c-11e9-8629-5caca03b6d56.jpg)

title: [VSF] Refund Tab: Improve confirmation messages
body:
- [ ] We should indicate if a transaction was voided or refunded in confirmation message.
- [ ] We should use the refund transaction ID in lieu of the payment ID

![screen shot 2019-02-12 at 8 01 21 am](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25444105/52644628-6c675d00-2e9c-11e9-916a-1232ff35707e.jpg)

title: [VSF] Leads Tab: Change columns/data
body:
- [ ] A VSF user should be able to see the sales they submitted to AMG (successfully) for the last 7 days.
- [ ] **A VSF user should NOT be able to see sales submitted by another user.
- [ ] Leads should not be clickable (as they are now)
- [ ] Columns
1. Name
2. Verification Code
3. Authorization Code
4. Agent ($Packages.Agent:$Packages.Sales Agent)
5. Package Price

title: VSF: Capture/Void Tool - Display Totals
body: As an admin, I would like to see a total count of transactions and the sum of transactions listed. And then when I select transactions, I would like to see the total count of transactions selected as well as the sum of those transactions.
